module.name: ap210_laminate_assembly_design
module.keywords: module, laminate assembly, interconnect substrate, electrical, optical, sequential lamination

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of laminate assembly design. This data provides physical assembly information sufficient to allow communication of the relative vertical arrangement of laminates in an interconnect product, and required interconnections among the materials assembled. The geometric pattern design details to be applied to a laminate are covered in other clauses in this part of ISO 10303. Configuration management information and design management information is provided.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Design product data management, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1628;
items within the scope of application module Sequential laminate assembly design, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1741.

outscope.li: detailed definition of a particular laminate assembly process.
